column1: #Text=Bolin says : " Hang on , I think I got it .
#Text=It 's the best way to learn metalbending .
#Text=But I thought you were supposed to be practicing metalbending , not earthbending .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Mako , metalbending is extremely difficult .
#Text=No one gets it right away , if they can get it at all !
#Text=" Asami says : " Guys , it 's time to get cleaned up .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , now I have to say bye to Opal ?
